answers.answer: Thanks for using the forum.Gestational diabetes during one pregnancy does not mean that you will definitely have it again with the next. However, there is an increased likelihood. Gestational diabetes does not get worse with each pregnancy. Every pregnancy is different, this applies to the gestational diabetes as well.Good luck.Cathy

question: If having diabetes during the,first pregnancy happened would or could it b worse during a second pregnancy
title: reoccurring gestational diabetes
